name: WorkTomato
0:
”Alexa, ask Work Tomato to start”
”Alexa, open Work Tomato”
”Alexa, ask Work Tomato I'm ready”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: work tomato
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Work Tomato is a tool that will help you to work more effectively. Using the Pomodoro technique, you’ll increase your productivity by doing more in less time. 
The length of time to which the work is divided is conventionally called “tomato”. Work Tomato is a cycle of 4 “tomatoes”. One "tomato" lasts for 30 minutes: 25 minutes of work and 5 minutes of rest. 

After 4 tomatoes are gone it is recommended to take a longer break of 15-20 minutes or more if it is a lunch time for example. After the longer break just say “Alexa, open Work Tomato” and the cycle will start again.

Note: This skill is in no way associated with the “Pomodoro Technique”, “Pomodoro” and Francesco Cirillo.
The Pomodoro Technique® and Pomodoro™ are registered trademarks by Francesco Cirillo.
